about_the_game:
Cosmic Companions is a relaxing life simulator, in which you are an astronaut traveling the vast and unknown universe, befriending new alien species and inviting them to your growing cosmic community.

- Find new and strange worlds, land with your dropship, and explore alien vegetation and animal life.
- Make first contact with aliens, be social if you want to, and invite them to your orbiting starship.
- Get funds from earth for creating a cosmic community.
- Use your funds for furniture, better engines that moves you quicker to the next planet, and more.
- Change hair/skin color, and more.
- Build new modules, like more rooms for new companions, research modules, and more.
- Some alien insects placed in an evolution chamber, may evolve into social aliens.
- It´s a game designed not to be played in one go, so set a course for the next world. It can take hours to reach it.
